item.title: Swarm Buzz
item.description: One of the easiest ways to include source code in your WildFly Swarm blog posts is by using the metalsmith-gist plugin. You don’t need to know anything about the plugin to use it though, so don’t worry.
item.dc:creator: Joseph Stinger
